casebody.data:
Mark HUEBNER
v.
TRIANGLE RESEARCH COLLABORATIVE, a North Carolina Corporation, and Thaddeus K. Szostak. No. 513P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 5, 2009. John M. Kirby, Raleigh, for Huebner. Norman B. Smith, Greensboro, for Triangle Research, et al. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 667 S.E.2d 309 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 18th day of November 2008 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th day of February 2009."
